concept.title: MapR Streams Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The MapR Streams Consumer origin reads messages from MapR Streams.

conbody.p: MapR Streams Consumer originovervieworiginsMapR Streams ConsumerWhen you configure a MapR Streams Consumer, you configure the topic, consumer group, and other general properties. You configure the data type and related properties, and you can optionally add additional MapR Streams properties and supported Kafka properties.

p.note: provides several MapR origins to address different needs. For a quick comparison chart to help you choose the right one, see Comparing MapR Origins.
